D

dealCard(Player, boolean) - Method in class com.nickeson.game.cardgame.blackjack.BlackjackDealer
 
dealCard(Player, boolean) - Method in interface com.nickeson.game.cardgame.Dealer
deal a single Card by removing it from the Card collection (deck/shoe), then adding it to a Player's Hand and inUse pile - Card has a boolean value faceUp

dealHand() - Method in class com.nickeson.game.cardgame.blackjack.BlackjackDealer
 
dealHand() - Method in interface com.nickeson.game.cardgame.Dealer
deal a Hand of Cards by removing the Cards from the Card collection, (deck/shoe), then adding them to the Player's Hand and inUse pile

discard(Card) - Method in interface com.nickeson.game.cardgame.Deck
